languages.text: Жалобно стенающий о своей невиновности старик был безжалостно вышвырнут в шлюз. Смерть изменникам династии и пособникам их!
Despite his pitiful wails about his innocence, the old man is thrown out of an airlock. Traitors to the dynasty and their accomplices must die!
languages.original_text: Жалобно стенающий о своей невиновности старик был безжалостно вышвырнут в шлюз. Смерть изменникам династии и пособникам их!

traits.locale_text: Despite pitiful wails about his innocence, the old man was ruthlessly thrown out of an airlock. Traitors to the dynasty and their accomplices must die!
Despite pitiful wails about his innocence, the old man was ruthlessly thrown out of an airlock. Traitors to the dynasty and their accomplices must die!
Despite pitiful wails about his innocence, the old man was ruthlessly thrown out of an airlock. Traitors to the dynasty and their accomplices must die!
Despite pitiful wails about his innocence, the old man was ruthlessly thrown out of an airlock. Traitors to the dynasty and their accomplices must die!
Despite his pitiful wails about his innocence, the old man is thrown out of an airlock. Traitors to the dynasty and their accomplices must die!
Despite his pitiful wails about his innocence, the old man is thrown out of an airlock. Traitors to the dynasty and their accomplices must die!

languages.text: A pesar de sus patéticos lamentos sobre su inocencia, el anciano abandona la nave por una esclusa. ¡Los traidores a la dinastía y sus cómplices deben morir!
languages.original_text: Despite his pitiful wails about his innocence, the old man is thrown out of an airlock. Traitors to the dynasty and their accomplices must die!

traits.locale_text: A pesar de sus patéticos lamentos sobre su inocencia, el anciano abandona la nave por una esclusa. ¡Los traidores a la dinastía y sus cómplices deben morir!

languages.text: 無実を訴える哀れな叫びを無視して、老人をエアロックから放り出した。王朝の裏切り者とその共犯者は、死ぬ運命なのだ！
languages.original_text: Despite his pitiful wails about his innocence, the old man is thrown out of an airlock. Traitors to the dynasty and their accomplices must die!

traits.locale_text: 無実を訴える哀れな叫びを無視して、老人をエアロックから放り出した。王朝の裏切り者とその共犯者は、死ぬ運命なのだ！

languages.text: 尽管老人悲惨地放声大哭，坚称自己是清白的，但他还是被扔出了气闸。王朝的叛徒和叛徒的帮凶只有死路一条！
languages.original_text: Despite his pitiful wails about his innocence, the old man is thrown out of an airlock. Traitors to the dynasty and their accomplices must die!

traits.locale_text: 尽管老人悲惨地放声大哭，坚称自己是清白的，但他还是被扔出了气闸。王朝的叛徒和叛徒的帮凶只有死路一条！

languages.text: Trotz seiner jämmerlichen Unschuldsbeteuerungen wird der alte Mann aus einer Luftschleuse geworfen. Verräter an der Dynastie und ihre Komplizen müssen sterben!
languages.original_text: Despite his pitiful wails about his innocence, the old man is thrown out of an airlock. Traitors to the dynasty and their accomplices must die!

traits.locale_text: Trotz seiner jämmerlichen Unschuldsbeteuerungen wird der alte Mann aus einer Luftschleuse geworfen. Verräter an der Dynastie und ihre Komplizen müssen sterben!

languages.text: Le vieil homme a beau clamer son innocence, il est jeté par un sas. Les traîtres à la dynastie et leurs complices doivent mourir !
languages.original_text: Despite his pitiful wails about his innocence, the old man is thrown out of an airlock. Traitors to the dynasty and their accomplices must die!

traits.locale_text: Le vieil homme a beau clamer son innocence, il est jeté par un sas. Les traîtres à la dynastie et leurs complices doivent mourir !
